μ½”λ“ λ³΄κΈ° 
class Node {
  constructor(val) {
    this.val = val;
    this.next = null;
    this.prev = null;
  }
}

class DoublyLinkedList {
  constructor() {
    this.head = null;
    this.tail = null;
    this.length = 0;
  }

  // λ§μ§€λ§‰μ— μ”μ† μ¶”κ°€
  push(val) {
    // λ…Έλ“ λ§λ“¤κΈ°
    let newNode = new Node(val);

    // λΉ„μ–΄μλ”μ§€ ν™•μΈ
    if (this.length === 0) {
      this.head = newNode;
      this.tail = newNode;
    } else {
      // μ¶”κ°€ν• μ”μ†κ°€ λ§μ§€λ§‰ λ…Έλ“κ°€ λλ„λ΅ μ„¤μ •
      // prev, next μ—°κ²°
      this.tail.next = newNode;
      newNode.prev = this.tail;
      this.tail = newNode;
    }
    this.length++;
    return this;
  }

  // λ§μ§€λ§‰ μ”μ† μ‚­μ 
  pop() {
    // λΉ„μ–΄μλ”μ§€ ν™•μΈ
    if (!this.head) return undefined;
    // μ§μ „ λ…Έλ“κ°€ λ§μ§€λ§‰ μ”μ†κ°€ λλ„λ΅ μ„¤μ •
    let poppedNode = this.tail;
    if (this.length === 1) {
      this.head = null;
      this.tail = null;
    } else {
      this.tail = poppedNode.prev;
      this.tail.next = null;
      // μ‚­μ ν•  λ…Έλ“μ μ—°κ²° λκΈ°
      poppedNode.prev = null;
    }
    this.length--;
    return poppedNode;
  }

  // μ• μ”μ† μ‚­μ 
  shift() {
    // λΉ„μ–΄μλ”μ§€ ν™•μΈ
    if (this.length === 0) return undefined;
    // μ‚­μ ν•  λ…Έλ“μ μ—°κ²° λκΈ°
    let oldHead = this.head;
    // μ”μ†κ°€ ν•κ°μΌ κ²½μ°
    if (this.length === 1) {
      this.head = null;
      this.tail = null;
    } else {
      // 2λ² μ”μ†κ°€ head μ—­ν• ν•κ²
      this.head = oldHead.next;
      this.head.prev = null;
      oldHead.next = null;
    }
    this.length--;
    return oldHead;
  }

  // μ• μ”μ† μ¶”κ°€
  unshift(val) {
    let newNode = new Node(val);
    // λΉ„μ–΄μλ”μ§€ ν™•μΈ
    if (this.length === 0) {
      this.head = newNode;
      this.tail = newNode;
    } else {
      // μƒ λ…Έλ“ μ—°κ²°
      this.head.prev = newNode;
      newNode.next = this.head;
      this.head = newNode;
    }
    this.length++;
    return this;
  }

  // μΈλ±μ¤μ— ν•΄λ‹Ήν•λ” κ°’ κ°€μ Έμ¤κΈ°
  get(index) {
    // μΈλ±μ¤κ°€ μ ν¨ν•μ§€ ν™•μΈν•κΈ°
    if (index < 0 || index >= this.length) return null;
    // μΈλ±μ¤κ°€ κ°€κΉμ΄ μ„μΉ ν™•μΈν•κΈ° (μ•/λ’¤)
    let count = 0;
    if (index <= this.length / 2) {
      // μ•λ¶€ν„°μ°ΎκΈ° μΈλ±μ¤μ— ν•΄λ‹Ήν•λ” κ°’ κ°€μ Έμ¤κΈ°
      let current = this.head;
      while (count !== index) {
        current = current.next;
        count++;
      }
      return current;
    } else {
      // λ’¤λ¶€ν„°μ°ΎκΈ° μΈλ±μ¤μ— ν•΄λ‹Ήν•λ” κ°’ κ°€μ Έμ¤κΈ°
      let count = this.length - 1;
      let current = this.tail;
      while (count !== index) {
        current = current.prev;
        count--;
      }
      return current;
    }
  }

  // μΈλ±μ¤μ— κ°’ λ³€κ²½ν•κΈ°
  set(index, val) {
    // ν•΄λ‹Ή μΈλ±μ¤ κ°’ νΈμ¶
    let foundNode = this.get(index);
    if (foundNode !== null) {
      foundNode.val = val;
      return true;
    }
    return false;
  }

  // μΈλ±μ¤μ— κ°’ μ¶”κ°€ν•κΈ°
  insert(index, val) {
    // μΈλ±μ¤ κ°’ μ ν¨μ„± ν™•μΈ, μ²μμ΄λ‚ λ§μ§€λ§‰μΌλ• κΈ°μ΅΄ λ©”μ„λ“ ν™μ©
    if (index < 0 || index > this.length) return undefined;
    if (index === 0) return !!this.unshift(val);
    if (index === this.length) return !!this.push(val);

    // ν•΄λ‹Ή μΈλ±μ¤ κ°’ νΈμ¶
    let newNode = new Node(val);
    let beforeNode = this.get(index - 1);
    let afterNode = beforeNode.next;

    // μ—°κ²° μμ •
    beforeNode.next = newNode;
    newNode.prev = beforeNode;
    newNode.next = afterNode;
    afterNode.prev = newNode;
    this.length++;
    return true;
  }

  // μΈλ±μ¤μ— ν•΄λ‹Ήν•λ” κ°’ μ κ±°
  remove(index) {
    // μΈλ±μ¤ κ°’ μ ν¨μ„± ν™•μΈ
    if (index < 0 || index > this.length) return undefined;
    if (index === 0) return this.shift();
    if (index === index.length - 1) return this.pop();

    // ν•΄λ‹Ή μΈλ±μ¤ κ°’ νΈμ¶
    let removedNode = this.get(index);
    let beforeNode = removedNode.prev;
    let afterNode = removedNode.next;

    // μ—°κ²° μμ •
    beforeNode.next = afterNode;
    afterNode.prev = beforeNode;
    removedNode.next = null;
    removedNode.prev = null;
    this.length--;
    return removedNode;
  }

  reverse() {
    let node = this.head;
    this.head = this.tail;
    this.tail = node;
    let next;
    let prev = null;
    for (let i = 0; i < this.length; i++) {
      next = node.next;
      node.next = prev;
      prev = node;
      node = next;
    }
    return this;
  }
}
